trans-unit.id: Generally, you only want to batch edit unit level and skill level. If switch on this option, every field will be saved on all selected charas. Make sure you have understood what's the meaning of this option before saving.
trans-unit.source: Generally, you only want to batch edit unit level and skill level. If switch on this option, every field will be saved on all selected charas. Make sure you have understood what's the meaning of this option before saving.
trans-unit.target: 通常には、キャラレベルとスキルレベルだけを一括編集することです。 このオプションをオンにすると、すべてのフィールドにすべての選択したキャラにが保存されます。 保存する前に、このオプションの意味を理解していることを確認してください。
お誕生日おめでとうございます！！

trans-unit.id: Summon a field of radius %d to deal [%@] %@ damage per second for [%@]s to %@.

trans-unit.target: 半径%1$dのフィールドを展開し、%5$@に毎秒[%2$@]の%3$@ダメージを与える、効果時間[%4$@]秒。

trans-unit.id: Summon a healing field of radius %d at position of %@ to heal [%@]%@ HP per second for [%@]s.
trans-unit.source: Summon a healing field of radius %1$d at position of %2$@ to heal [%3$@]%4$@ HP per second for [%5$@]s.
trans-unit.target: %2$@の位置で半径%1$dのフィールドを展開し、毎秒[%3$@%4$@]のHPを回復させる、効果時間[%5$@]秒。

trans-unit.id: The caster gain a mark(ID: %@, max stacks %@, lasts for [%@]s) each time receives a buff, this effect lasts for [%@]s.
trans-unit.source: The caster gain a mark(ID: %1$@, max stacks %2$@, lasts for [%3$@]s) each time receives a buff, this effect lasts for [%4$@]s.
trans-unit.target: 自分がバフを受けるたび、マーク[ID：%1$@]を1スタック増やせる、バフ時間[%3$@]秒、効果時間[%4$@]秒、この効果は最大[%2$@]までスタックできる。

trans-unit.id: The caster gain a mark(ID: %@, max stacks %@, lasts for [%@]s) each time receives a hit, this effect lasts for [%@]s.
trans-unit.source: The caster gain a mark(ID: %1$@, max stacks %2$@, lasts for [%3$@]s) each time receives a hit, this effect lasts for [%4$@]s.

trans-unit.target: メールアカウントを見つかりませんでした。

trans-unit.id: These settings are used for automatically adding events to your system Calendar whenever game data is updated inside this app. The events in system Calendar will be grouped in separate calendars with prefix "Hatsune's Notes".\n**IMPORTANT**: It's not recommended to enable these settings on multiple devices of the same iCloud account, which will result in multiple calendar groups with the same content.
trans-unit.source: These settings are used for automatically adding events to your system Calendar whenever game data is updated inside this app. The events in system Calendar will be grouped in separate calendars with prefix "Hatsune's Notes".\n**IMPORTANT**: It's not recommended to enable these settings on multiple devices of the same iCloud account, which will result in multiple calendar groups with the same content.
trans-unit.target: これらの設定は、このアプリ内でゲームデータが更新されるたびに、システムカレンダーにイベントを自動的に追加するために使用されます。 システムカレンダーのイベントは、接頭辞「Hatsune's Notes」が付いた個別のカレンダーにグループ化されます。\n**重要**：同じiCloudアカウントの複数のデバイスでこれらの設定を有効にすることはお勧めしません。これにより、複数のカレンダーグループに同じ内容が出現することがあります。

trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if attack speed is not increased

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ if it has a barrier
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if it has a barrier

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ if it has no barrier
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if it has no barrier

trans-unit.target: %2$@が独りの場合、[アクション%1$d]を使う

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ if it's magical unit
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if it's magical unit
trans-unit.target: %2$@が魔法攻撃を行う場合、[アクション%1$d] を使う

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ if it's multi-target unit
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if it's multi-target unit

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ if it's not alone
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if it's not alone
trans-unit.target: %2$@が独りでない場合、[アクション%1$d]を使う

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ if it's not multi-target unit
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if it's not multi-target unit

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ if it's physical unit
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if it's physical unit
trans-unit.target: %2$@が物理攻撃を行う場合、[アクション%1$d] を使う
%2$@が%3$@でない場合、[アクション%1$d]を使う

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ if not in state of ID: %d
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ if not in state of ID: %3$d
trans-unit.target: %2$@がマーク[ID：%3$d]を持っていない場合、[アクション%1$d]を使う

trans-unit.id: use %d to %@ in state of ID: %d
trans-unit.source: use %1$d to %2$@ in state of ID: %3$d
trans-unit.target: %2$@がマーク[ID：%3$d]を持っている場合、[アクション%1$d]を使う
